slides.title: Example Project — Cloud Platform
slides.subtitle: A sample cloud platform project for demonstration purposes.
slides.challenge: The team needed a modern cloud platform to replace legacy on-premise tooling. Existing systems were slow, siloed, and difficult to maintain.
slides.built: Designed and built a full-stack cloud application with real-time data visualization, role-based access control, and automated CI/CD pipelines.
impact: **5x faster** workflow compared to legacy system
**Zero downtime** across first year of production usage
Adopted by teams across multiple regions

images.title: Cloud Platform
images.caption: Application dashboard with real-time data visualization

slides.title: Example Project — Data Dashboard
slides.subtitle: An interactive dashboard for operational analytics.
slides.challenge: Operations data was scattered across spreadsheets and manual reports with no way to identify trends or act on insights in real time.
built_items: **Interactive charts** — time-series visualizations with pan, zoom, and filtering
**Multi-source data ingestion** — unified view across disparate data exports
**Automated reporting** — scheduled PDF generation and email distribution
impact: **Reduced reporting time** from days to minutes
**Data-driven decisions** — stakeholders gained real-time operational visibility

images.title: Data Dashboard
images.caption: Interactive time-series charts with metric selection

slides.title: Example Project — Mobile Field App
slides.subtitle: A tablet application that digitized manual field data collection.
slides.challenge: Field operators recorded data on paper forms, making trend analysis impossible and introducing transcription errors.
slides.built: Built a tablet-based field application that replaced paper forms with a digital workflow, enabling real-time data capture and automated analysis.
impact: **Eliminated paper workflows** — fully digital data capture
**Enabled trend analysis** — structured data made patterns visible for the first time

images.title: Field Data App
images.caption: Tablet interface showing digital data entry form
